summary: Adds Town Walls to the Towns without them, specifically hold Capitals
descriptionHtml:
I was a bit disgruntled by the idea that some of the Hold capitals had no city walls. I mean this is a mideaval style world, in an area where few people actually use magic. 
There would be walls to keep the animals out if nothing else, I mean come on a troll could romp into town from any direction. 

Towns changed: 
Morthal & Dawnstar. 

I didn\'t change Winterhold, as the city was heavily affected by the events that destroyed most of it.
Which would include the subjective depression of the people living there....

Update 2.0
Falkreath now has a wall, this is the last wall I will be adding to this version of Town Walls,
As Riverwood don\'t in my mind rate a town wall, i won\'t be making one.
author: jerlord
